## Documentation Summary

Brief description of the documentation change or update.

Examples:
- Add missing usage examples
- Clarify behavior or edge cases
- Update outdated references
- Improve structure or readability

---

## Motivation

Why does this documentation change matter?

Examples:
- Prevents user confusion
- Aligns docs with current behavior
- Supports a new feature or release
- Improves onboarding or discoverability

## Scope of Changes

Where will this change occur?

Check all that apply:
- [ ] README
- [ ] API reference
- [ ] Usage / examples
- [ ] Installation or setup docs
- [ ] Changelog / release notes
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Notes / Content Outline

Optional notes, reminders, or rough content outline.

## Done When

What conditions must be met for this documentation task to be considered complete?

Examples:
- Content merged and visible in main docs
- Matches current library behavior
- Ready for next release
